about_the_game:
Scene Investigators is a deductive reasoning game for fans of detective films, true crime genre, escape room puzzles and especially for those who love the challenge of solving cases!

Set in the near future, you play as a trainee in pursuit of becoming a licensed P.I. (private investigator). Presented with a set of case files, some simple while others challenging, the goal is to solve them and pass the test. Your only tools are your keen perception, mental sharpness, and real-life experience. Can you solve them all?

About the demo

This case is one of a dinner party. Five friends and acquaintances have gathered for a meal. Someone was murdered. All the clues are in the scene. Submit your answers and see if the case is truly solved.

name: Scene Investigators Demo
short_description: Scene Investigators is a deductive reasoning game for fans of the "true crime" genre. Step into re-created crime scenes, observe closely for pieces of evidence, analyze possible motives behind the crimes, and uncover what truly happened.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Russian, French, German, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
